segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, waiting so patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s dreaming of that sweet treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the excitement in her eyes as she watches her brother.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s not even touching the stool, just standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever been caught doing this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the jar, and she’s just as focused on him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it this time, but I also hope they don’t fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water on the floor is making me nervous for them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how innocent they look, even though they’re up to no good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re just kids being kids, and it’s kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR
